in resources industry sales — or mining and oil equipment — which fell 37% in Asia. Caterpillar's sales decline reflects, on a broader scale, the slowdown in China, as it transitions from an industrial-based to a consumer-based economy.

Economists had forecast that first-time unemployment insurance claims totaled 270,000, versus 276,000 in the prior period.

to 271,000 last week, by less than expected. Economists had forecast that first-time unemployment insurance claims totaled 270,000, versus 276,000 in the prior period.

The

index rose to +1.9 in November from -4.5 in October, beating forecasts, and indicating that business conditions in the region improved.

"Indexes for new orders, shipments, and average work hours, however, continued to suggest weakness," the report noted.
